actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to allow a credit, in lieu of a deduction, for interest paid on a mortgage on a taxpayer's principal residence and for real property taxes paid on such principal residence.

summary.text: Revises the Internal Revenue Code by allowing a tax credit, in lieu of a deduction, for interest paid on a mortgage on a taxpayer's principal residence and for real property taxes paid on such principal residence.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to allow a credit, in lieu of a deduction, for interest paid on a mortgage on a taxpayer's principal residence and for real property taxes paid on such principal residence.
